faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is Ledgerly really free to use?
faq.a1: Yes! Ledgerly offers a free forever plan that includes up to 50 customers, unlimited transactions, offline mode, and basic reports. No credit card required to get started.
faq.q2: Can I use Ledgerly without internet?
faq.a2: Absolutely! Ledgerly is built as a Progressive Web App (PWA) with full offline support. You can add customers, record debts, and track payments even without internet. Your data syncs automatically when you're back online.
faq.q3: How does the automatic backup work?
faq.a3: Your data is automatically synced to our secure cloud servers whenever you have an internet connection. All data is encrypted using bank-grade AES-256 encryption, so your records are always safe and accessible.
faq.q4: What currencies and languages are supported?
faq.a4: Ledgerly supports multiple currencies including TRY, IDR, NGN, EGP, ZAR, and more. The app is available in 7 languages: Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, English, Arabic, Spanish, and Zulu.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Ledgerly
faq.q1: Is Ledgerly really free to use?
faq.a1: Yes! Ledgerly offers a free forever plan that includes up to 10 customers, unlimited transactions, offline mode, and basic reports. No credit card required to get started.
faq.q2: Can I use Ledgerly without internet?
faq.a2: Absolutely! Ledgerly is built as a Progressive Web App (PWA) with full offline support. You can add customers, record debts, and track payments even without internet. Your data syncs automatically when you're back online.
faq.q3: How does the automatic backup work?
faq.a3: Your data is automatically synced to our secure cloud servers whenever you have an internet connection. All data is encrypted using bank-grade AES-256 encryption, so your records are always safe and accessible.
faq.q4: What currencies and languages are supported?
faq.a4: Ledgerly supports multiple currencies including TRY (Turkish Lira), IDR (Indonesian Rupiah), NGN (Nigerian Naira), EGP (Egyptian Pound), ZAR (South African Rand), and more. The app is available in 7 languages: Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, English, Arabic, Spanish, and Zulu.
faq.q5: How do I send payment reminders to customers?
faq.a5: You can send reminders directly through WhatsApp with pre-filled messages. Just open a customer's details and tap the WhatsApp button. Pro users also get automated SMS reminders.
faq.a6: Yes! You can export your customer statements as PDF files and your transaction history as CSV spreadsheets. This feature is available on both free and paid plans.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: At Ledgerly, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our service.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including: your name, email address, phone number, business name, customer data, and transaction records. We also automatically collect certain information when you use our service, including your device type, IP address, browser type, and usage data.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to: provide and maintain our service, process your transactions, send you technical notices and support messages, respond to your comments and questions, monitor and analyze trends, and detect and prevent fraud.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with: service providers who perform services on our behalf, professional advisors such as lawyers and accountants, and law enforcement if required by law.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage. We use bank-grade AES-256 encryption for all data at rest and in transit.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have the right to: access your personal data, correct inaccurate data, delete your data, object to processing, and data portability. Contact us to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@ledgerly.app

termsPage.intro: Welcome to Ledgerly. By using our service, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Ledgerly, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this service.

description.title: Description of Service
description.content: Ledgerly provides a digital credit ledger application for micro-SMEs to track customer debts and payments. The service includes offline functionality, cloud backup, and reporting features.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You must provide accurate and complete information when creating your account. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account.

acceptable.title: Acceptable Use
acceptable.content: You agree to use Ledgerly only for lawful purposes. You may not: use the service to store or transmit malicious code, attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems, interfere with or disrupt the service, or use the service to violate any laws.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Some features require a paid subscription. You agree to pay all fees associated with your account. Subscriptions automatically renew unless cancelled before the renewal date. All payments are non-refundable except as required by law.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for any reason, including violation of these terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease. You may terminate your account at any time through your account settings.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: Ledgerly shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the 12 months preceding the claim.
